Class WebServiceUtil

java.lang.Object
br.com.concepting.framework.webservice.util.WebServiceUtil
public class WebServiceUtil extends Object
Utility class responsible to manipulate web services.

    • deserialize

      public static <O> O deserialize(InputStream in, Class<?> clazz) throws IllegalArgumentException, NoSuchMethodException, IllegalAccessException, InvocationTargetException, InstantiationException, ClassNotFoundException, NoSuchFieldException, IOException
      Deserializes a content.
      Type Parameters:
      O - Class that defines the content.
      Parameters:
      in - Stream that contains the content.
      clazz - Class that defines the content.
      Returns:
      Instance that contains the content.
      Throws:
      IllegalArgumentException - Occurs when was not possible to deserialize the content.
      NoSuchMethodException - Occurs when was not possible to deserialize the content.
      IllegalAccessException - Occurs when was not possible to deserialize the content.
      InvocationTargetException - Occurs when was not possible to deserialize the content.
      InstantiationException - Occurs when was not possible to deserialize the content.
      ClassNotFoundException - Occurs when was not possible to deserialize the content.
      NoSuchFieldException - Occurs when was not possible to deserialize the content.
      IOException - Occurs when was not possible to deserialize the content.
